ing: 1 (15 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice
des: "Wine, lemonade, liquor and fruit make this very tasty and easy to drink sangria. Use any mix of fruit you'd like. Soooo yummy!  Beware! It's soooo easy to drink. If you like a less sweet drink, use club soda instead of soda."
ins:
Combine Chardonnay wine, pineapple chunks, lemonade concentrate, rum, triple sec, grapes, apple, orange, and lime in a large pitcher. Refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight.
Stir lemon-lime soda into pitcher just before serving.
